span.p: The Marin County Office of Education offers programs and services for students, teachers, and families in Marin County. MCOE services eighteen school districts in our county, supporting technology and educational services in public as well as private K-12 institutions.

div.class: hp row one gb-section flex fd-c

span.a: Using Technology with Math: Innovative Tools for All Learners
LUNA DANCE Integrating Math, Dance and Movement May 2020

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

img.alt: Image of the Marin County Hackathon Flyer

div.p: In this long-day celebration of design, problem-solving and creativity, eighty young problem-solvers in one giant room will use their skills to help build a Marin that's more resilient, safe, healthy and sustainable.

a.title: Go to comments for Marin County Hackathon

img.alt: Image of the Marin Women League of Voters flyer

div.p: Need a program for upcoming meeting or event? The League of Women voters has speakers available.

a.title: Go to comments for Marin Women League of Voters

img.alt: Image of the Beyond Difference: Teen Board Parent Workshops flyer

a.span: Beyond Difference: Teen Board Parent Workshops

div.p: Come and learn conversation tools and activities to engagewith your children about social isolation and belonging!

a.title: Go to comments for Beyond Difference: Teen Board Parent Workshops

img.alt: Image of the Supporting Inclusive Practice in ECE Programs workshop flyer

a.span: Supporting Inclusive Practice in ECE Programs

div.p: Building on the Spring Early Learning Summit, "The Gifts They Bring", this workshop will guide understanding and development of practices, policies and procedures for ECE Program Leaders providing high quality Inclusive Early Learning and Care Environments.

a.title: Go to comments for Supporting Inclusive Practice in ECE Programs

img.alt: Image of the Marin County Leadership Institute workshop flyer

div.p: This is a one year, 2.5 semester program. All classes are hybrid/blended with face-to-face meetings scheduled every-other Saturday.

a.title: Go to comments for Marin County Leadership Institute
